Metadata.Title: CVE-2021-20286 affecting package libnbd for versions less than 1.18.3-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2021-20286 affecting package libnbd for versions less than 1.18.3-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package libnbd is earlier than 1.18.3-1, affected by CVE-2021-20286
